item.title: Bear Shaving
item.description: I recently came across a blog post by Seth Godin where he coins the term ‘bear shaving’ which is where we address the symptoms of a problem instead of addressing the problem. The main example he gives is the idea of shaving a bear so that it can deal with the increased temperature caused by global warming instead of addressing the underlying problem which has led to this happening in the first place.
